channel.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
channel.description:
Inspired by this really-outdated thread below:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/achievement-suggestions-masterthread/220
Let's bring back the achievement master thread with current stuff!
1. It can range from easy to very difficult, but has to be realistically achievable. 2. It CANNOT encourage people to gamethrow to achieve it. 3. SFW for all ages. 4. Relative to the game's theme (medieval/fantasy) and/or [lore](https://tol.wikia.com/Lore). 5. Think up achievements that would **encourage you to play your class role correctly.**
Go go go~ Here's a template:
_______________________
**Name**: Unfortunate Soul **Description**: Alas, this unfortunate soul was the first to die on night 1. **Achieved By:** Dying n1 for 1st time.

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Name:friends
Description:you made 2 people close friends wow
Achived by:as mystic have the same 2 people talk to each other 2 nights in a row

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
3 fools is impossible XD 2 of one class only

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Name: OTC
Description: An end like the beginning.
Requirements: Win a game as Mercenary with your original target as the only other person alive.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: No Trials Allowed
Description: Have as few trials as possible.
Requirements: As an evil, have 3 fools and the starting Good King executed.

Name: Suicidal Assassin
Description: Make the Assassin take their own life
Requirements: As Court Wizard, redirect the Assassin into themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Name: BD Fool
Description: Wait, he was a Fool?!
Requirement: As a Fool, fail to get executed and live to the end of the game
(I have a pretty funny story about this actually)

Name: God Tier Paladin
Description: Just the NK left
Requirement: As the Paladin, kill all cult by N2(smite or lynching if you tested them)

Name: Inq In, Magic Out
Description: Not quite what you wanted
Requirement: As the Inquisitor, kill 3 non-sorc magic users with your Ruthless Efficiency

Name: Fool Me Once
Description: It won’t happen again
Requirement: Vote up and execute a Fool D2

Name: Fool me twice
Description: Who’s the real fool now?
Requirement: Execute a second fool as soon as the Fool days are over(as soon as you can Lynch again)

Name: Evil Merc
Description: To the highest bidder…
Requirement: As the NK, get the mercenary to contract you and win

Name: Party Life
Description: Completely Wasted
Requirement: Become Occupation Immune from N1 or be occupied/redirected 3 nights in a row
(This isn’t really game throwing but might be seen as it? It doesn’t have to be a salty Butler occupying you three nights in a row)

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: Chocolate
item.description:
Name: Bone Shark
Description:Your sacrifices were overdue.
Requirements: As a Reaper, slay the entire Cult and win

Name: Paid Shill
Description: Your check for 0.02 is this Friday.
Requirements: Be converted to the Unseen exactly one night before you become the King.

Name: We told them, didn’t we?
Description:“Just join us. We’ll figure out the rest”
Requirements: Win a game(while alive) where the only living people are as follows: The original Cult Leader, the original King(Neut/Cult), Two neutrals (who won)
[This can be CL/EvilKing/Alch/Merc] for example]

Name: Late Investment
Descriptions: You just bought the crown!
Requirements: As a Mastermind, convert someone who becomes the King before the sun comes back down.

Name: Beating a dead horse
Description: Thousands, and Thousands, and Thousands, and
Requirement: As a Scorned, win the game before Day Three, then be one of the first three votes to “put up” at least three Blue Dragon members who are then executed.

Name: 4D Chess!
Description: Sorry to keep you waiting, complicated business.
Requirement: As a Noble, Snoop the logs of the NK and the CL/MM, have one enemy faction kill the other, become the King, and force execute the final enemy as the King, winning the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
techwolves:

Name: unfornite psychic

Description: the spanish inquisitor has gone to far now wanting our local psychic dead

Achieved By: ether inquisitor killing the psychic with ruthless efficiency or the psychic dying to a neutral

Lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: Betrayal
Description: Kill the person you swore to protect.
Requirements: As Sellsword, use Revenge on your former contract.

Name: Killing Spree
Description: Kill a fourth of the court
Requirements: Be Unseen on a night where you kill 4 people (Nightshade, 2 for 1, Revenge)

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Name: unfornite psychic
Description: the spanish inquisitor has gone to far now wanting our local psychic dead
Achieved By: ether inquisitor killing the psychic with ruthless efficiency or the psychic dying to a neutral

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Name: Trolled Trollbox (make a better name if you want)
Description: Wait, where did it go?
Requirement: Attempt to Trollbox a reaped/chilled target

Name: Triple Digits!!!
Description: Wow that’s a lot of deaths
Requirement: Play 100 Hours of ToL
(Hey I figured you needed some basic and easy achievements)

Name: Three in a row
Description: Seriously? Again?
Requirement: Get the same class 3 times in a row

Name: Anyone there?
Description: Oh why is your name gray?
Requirement: Link a reaped target as the Psychic

Name: Evil Evil King
Description: Wait whose side are you on?
Requirement: Be the first person to vote up and execute an evil as Evil King
(This happens early game when an evil is found by an investigator so I don’t think it’s throwing but I can get rid of it if you like)

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: Persuasive
Description: Persuade people to join your team.
Requirements: Convert 6 people in a game.

Name: Puppet
Description: Keep someone alive but unable to speak.
Requirements: As Reaper, insure someone says nothing in the day chat for 3 days (with Reap and Icy Touch)

Name: Slay the darkness
Description: Fell the Reaper of Corax
Requirements: Kill the Reaper at night (without Prince execute)

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Name: Hi Mom!
Description: You really like yourself, don’t you?
Requirement: Watch yourself execute someone in the day 3 times in 1 game

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Reaper survives Order Execution now with his souls

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: You only die twice
Description: Be killed twice, but continue to live
Requirement: Be attacked twice in a game, but use your souls to save yourself.

Name: Invincible
Description: You can’t be killed
Requirement: Survive 5 attacks in a game.

Name: Dark Contract
Description: Ensure the survival of the Reaper of Corax
Requirement: Win a game as Mercenary with the Reaper contracted.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Name: Speedrun
Description: Enough time for another one.
Achieved by: Ending the game with a victory before Night 2 as any class

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: Court of Corpses
Description: As King, be the last one standing
Requirements: End the game as King with no other players alive.

Name: Switcheroo
Description: Cause the Assassin to commit suicide.
Requirements: Make the Assassin kill their self using tornado.

Name: Neutral Slayer
Description: Kill all neutral classes.
Requirement: Kill all the neutral classes in the game yourself.

Name: Regicide
Description: Kill all the King, and his successors.
Requirement: Kill every King of an opposing faction yourself at night.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: Untouchable
Description: Survive death multiple times
Requirement: As a non immune class, be attacked but guarded, healed, etc. 3 times in a game by other people.

Name: Filicide
Description: Kill your own son.
Requirement: Decide Fate or Order Execution as Evil King to kill Prince.

Name: Malpractice
Description: Fail your patients as Physician or Alchemist.
Requirement: Have your target die 3 times while you are healing them as Physician or Alchemist.

Name: Soulhoarder
Description: Collect the souls of the whole court, and keep them.
Requirement: Win the game as Reaper, while never using Icy Touch or Gather Darkness.

Read full topic

Was that changed? I have seen Reaper survive King execution. Prince is the only unstoppable execution I know of.

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread II
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
NightX:

Name: Immortal

Description: Survive the King’s wrath.

Requirements: Survive being executed as Reaper.

Nope.

You can’t survive when being executed.
